item.title: Upalokayukta criticises inefficient officers in Raichur, books 18 suo motu cases for lapses
item.description:
<![CDATA[Upalokayukta B. Veerappa sharply attacked inefficient government officers and warned them of initiating action during his three-day visit to Raichur district which concluded on Saturday.
He registered 18 suo motu cases against officers for lapses in discharging duties and attending to public grievances.
Mr. Veerappa paid a surprise visit to several important government departments, hostels being run by different departments, hospitals, public places, bus stands, APMC Yard, mining areas, water ...]]>
item.author: Authors
